subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Rao Jodha?
question_hi: राव जोधरा ने किस मंगलवाल बनाया?
explanation_en:
Rao Jodha, the founder of the city of Jaipur, is known for building the Kumbhalgarh Fort.
